messages.message: @Kerry do we know where the documentation for this lives? Assuming that this might be internal documentation
@hannah - the customer time line is September for this project, do we know if it will be available before then?

Hey, sorry for confusion. Just to be clear:
• Our MT environment is deployed and hosted in the US
• Only OpenAI is supported on the MT environment as we don't support org level keys right now (this is for both commercial and enterprise MT)
The primary option here is to spin up a ST environment (our minimum ACV for ST should be at least $50K). This environment would be deployed in an EU region and could be provisioned with a Azure OpenAI key.
@hannah - I know I will be asked, do we have any view on when a multi tenant environment would be available in Europe? (I am assuming it wont be in the September time horizon)
@hannah or anyone else in this chain, were you by chance involved in setting up/ conversations on VRSF’s AI Hub and know if they are MT or ST?They are looking for the EU hosted options
@leila.tan - maybe you checked this already but it might be on the order form in the opportunity in SFDC?
Nothing on SFDC but instead found the deployment request!
VRSF is a single tenant deployment
VRSF can be provisioned with an azure openAI key

We have no plans right now to support a full EU MT environment, but it is something we’ve discussed in the past. We didn’t proceed with it as we didn’t have the customer demand to warrant the operational costs to support this. It is something we can discuss further  @shaunak @Kerry
